actor_awards.notes: Ebsen was a Disney Legend and has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame. He was originally cast as the Tin Man in 'The Wizard of Oz' but had to drop out due to a severe allergic reaction to the aluminum makeup. He is best known for his TV roles as Jed Clampett in 'The Beverly Hillbillies' and the title character in 'Barnaby Jones'.

filmography.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
filmography.role_description: The estranged, gentle husband of Holly Golightly who comes to New York to take her back to Texas.
filmography.plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

filmography.title: Davy Crockett, King of the Wild Frontier
filmography.role_description: Davy Crockett's loyal friend and sidekick who accompanies him on his adventures.
filmography.plot: Legends (and myths) from the life of the famed American frontiersman, including his time in Congress and at the Alamo.

filmography.title: The One and Only, Genuine, Original Family Band
filmography.role_description: The patriarch of a musical family who moves them to the Dakota Territory in the 1880s.
filmography.plot: A musical family moves to the Dakota Territory, where they become involved in the 1888 presidential election.

filmography.title: Broadway Melody of 1936
filmography.role_description: A talented dancer and the brother of the female lead, trying to make it in show business.
filmography.plot: A Broadway producer is sued by a woman who claims he stole her idea for a show.

filmography.title: Captain January
filmography.role_description: A kind-hearted sailor and friend to the lighthouse keeper, who dances with Shirley Temple.
filmography.plot: A lighthouse keeper rescues a little girl from a shipwreck and raises her as his own.

filmography.title: Born to Dance
filmography.role_description: A sailor and friend of the protagonist who provides comic relief and dance numbers.
filmography.plot: A sailor on leave falls in love with a young aspiring dancer who is understudying a Broadway star.

filmography.title: Attack
filmography.role_description: A pragmatic sergeant trying to survive under the command of a cowardly captain during WWII.
filmography.plot: A cowardly army captain is incompetent in battle, leading his men to threaten to kill him if he endangers them again.
filmography.awards: Venice Film Festival: Italian Film Critics Award

filmography.title: Night People
filmography.role_description: A tough, loyal sergeant assisting a Counter Intelligence Corps officer in post-war Berlin.
filmography.plot: A US soldier is kidnapped in Berlin, and his wealthy father tries to negotiate his release.

filmography.title: Mail Order Bride
filmography.role_description: An aging, retired lawman who promises a dying friend he will look after the friend's wild son.
filmography.plot: An old cowhand tries to tame a wild young man by marrying him off to a mail-order bride.

filmography.title: The Interns
filmography.role_description: A dedicated doctor and mentor to a group of new interns at a major hospital.
filmography.plot: A group of medical interns face personal and professional challenges during their first year at a hospital.

filmography.title: Banjo on My Knee
filmography.role_description: A simple-minded but good-natured shanty boater living on the Mississippi River.
filmography.plot: A riverboat man gets into a fight on his wedding night and flees, leaving his bride behind.

filmography.title: Broadway Melody of 1938
filmography.role_description: A horse caretaker who dances and helps the main characters with their show.
filmography.plot: A young horse trainer tries to get a producer to back a show starring his talented girlfriend.

filmography.title: The Girl of the Golden West
filmography.role_description: A rustler and dancer in this musical western adaptation.
filmography.plot: A saloon owner falls in love with a bandit who is actually a disguised Spanish nobleman.

filmography.title: Yellow Jack
filmography.role_description: One of the brave soldiers who volunteers for medical experiments to find a cure for yellow fever.
filmography.plot: The story of Major Walter Reed's campaign to determine the cause of yellow fever in Cuba.

filmography.title: My Lucky Star
filmography.role_description: A helpful college student who befriends a department store clerk sent to college as a publicity stunt.
filmography.plot: A department store clerk is sent to a university to model clothes and becomes a hit.

filmography.title: Four Girls in White
filmography.role_description: An orderly at the hospital where the four girls are training to be nurses.
filmography.plot: Four young women enter nursing school with different motivations and face the harsh realities of the profession.

filmography.title: The Kid from Texas
filmography.role_description: A cowboy sidekick who travels to New York with his friend to play polo.
filmography.plot: A cowboy travels to Long Island to play polo and impress a society girl.

filmography.title: They Met in Argentina
filmography.role_description: An oilman's sidekick who travels to Argentina to buy a racehorse.
filmography.plot: An oil tycoon sends a representative to Argentina to buy a racehorse, but he falls for the owner's daughter instead.

filmography.title: Parachute Battalion
filmography.role_description: A hillbilly recruit who joins the paratroopers and brings comic relief.
filmography.plot: Three young men from different backgrounds join the paratroopers and train for war.

filmography.title: Sing Your Worries Away
filmography.role_description: A naive songwriter who inherits a fortune and is targeted by gangsters.
filmography.plot: A songwriter inherits a fortune, but his crooked cousin tries to drive him insane to get the money.

filmography.title: Thunder in God's Country
filmography.role_description: The comedic sidekick to cowboy star Rex Allen in this western.
filmography.plot: A singing cowboy and his sidekick help a town fight against a corrupt gambling syndicate.

filmography.title: Silver City Bonanza
filmography.role_description: Rex Allen's sidekick who helps investigate a murder and a legend of lost silver.
filmography.plot: A cowboy investigates the murder of a blind man who supposedly knew the location of a silver mine.

filmography.title: Red Garters
filmography.role_description: A western town character in this stylized musical spoof.
filmography.plot: A musical spoof of westerns where a cowboy rides into town to avenge his brother's death.

filmography.title: Between Heaven and Hell
filmography.role_description: A sharecropper turned soldier who serves alongside a wealthy landowner, highlighting class differences.
filmography.plot: A wealthy Southern landowner is demoted and sent to a combat unit where he learns humility and courage.

filmography.title: Napoleon and Samantha
filmography.role_description: The grandfather of the main character who passes away, sparking the children's journey.
filmography.plot: Two children run away with an old pet lion to save it from being sent to a zoo.
